accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 00/00/2008.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Sylvie lives in New York in 1931, per her diary.  Diary has "S.I.S." embossed on the front. She dates Joe and other "guys." She works at Gross on occasion. She takes a Home Economics course during night school. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/S.I.S. Sylvie.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Diary by Sylvie, written in 1931. Cover of diary has "S.I.S." embossed on it. Photograph of Sylvie on first page. Cards inserted in front of diary mention Lawrence H. Guill, L. Phillips Hunt, Henry Thiel (N.C. State Raleigh) and Joseph A. Kirkman.Sylvie is ill at the beginning of the year. She dates Joe and other "guys." She works at Gross on occasion. She takes a Home Economics course during night school.Diary mainly about her social life including dates, church and activities with her friends.
